column5: Ebay is a good place to find some pretty neat stuff... like this custom-painted Mann bait. Beautiful job, eh?  Here's the listing...  http://cgi.ebay.com/New-Custom-Painted-Man...n%3D8%26ps%3D33
The person painting those has some serious talent...  I wonder if I gave him a photo,,,could he paint me in to a pic with me holding a 15lb rainbow trout on the Maitland river ?  lol
very nice job on those for sure.....  but.....have you put them to use yet???
Oh, I didn't buy one --- I just thought it was cool. It's such a little work of art I'm not sure you'd want a fish to chomp down on it.
